name: Dodge Roll (CreatureBox)
description:
Dodge Roll is a dice building, card swapping RPG that challenges you to utilize your various collected dice and cards to defeat waves of enemies!

Story:

A being known as Cathulu was summoned by a group of cultists in hopes of ending the world. Ever since Cathulu's arrival, the world has gradually been plagued with corruption, destruction, and many horrible creatures.

You are one of the many adventurers that dare to step foot on the tainted lands with hopes of vanquishing Cathulu once and for all. Will you be able to save the world from total annihilation?

Advice For Playing:

*Hovering over underlined text, enemies, and your dice during combat will reveal useful and specific information that may help you come up with strategies*
